participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, Alex often worries about how others will react to his decisions, but he is also passionate about his work and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I'm worried that my parents will find out about my deployment. I have a consulting firm. I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good. I am of a healthy weight for my height. I have started baking for my family and friends.

participant_2.name: Jessica Lee
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and adventurous, Jessica enjoys living in the moment and values experiences over appearances, with a nurturing side towards her friends and family.
participant_2.background: I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend. I'm a car enthusiast searching for a quiet, private home with plenty of space for my vintage cars. I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year. I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays. I'm interested in learning more about how to raise my kids on my own.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
Hello! It's going pretty well, thank you! How about yours?
It's going good! A little bit stressed because I am trying to figure out how to tell my parents about my upcoming deployment.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure they'll be understanding though.
I hope so! I'm not sure how they're going to react.
Well, I'm sure they'll be happy that you're doing something that you're passionate about.
I hope so! I'm really excited about it, but I'm also a little bit nervous.
That's totally understandable! I'm sure everything will be fine.
Thank you! I hope so too!
So, what's your consulting firm do?
We help businesses with their marketing and branding.
Oh cool! That sounds like a fun job.
It can be! It's also a lot of work, but it's worth it when you see the results.
I'm sure it is! So, do you have any hobbies?
I love to bake! I've been baking for my family and friends lately.
That's awesome! I love baking too! What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to bake cookies! I'm actually baking some right now.
Oh that's awesome! I love cookies too! I'm going to have to come over and try some.
